concept.title: SDC Record Data Format
concept.shortdesc: SDC Record is a proprietary data format that the uses to generate error records. The can also use the data format to read and write data.

conbody.p: SDC Recordsdata formatpipeline designSDC Record data formatUse the SDC Record data format to process data from another pipeline or to generate data to be processed by another pipeline.

You can use the following origins to read SDC Record data:
Directory
Kafka Consumer
Kinesis Consumer

You can use the following destinations to write SDC Record data:
Flume
Kafka Producer
Kinesis Producer
